name: Dimension Warp
description:
A new way of travel to other spacial dimension have been discovered, but still is not tested with a human.

This first person game will inmerse you to other dimensions where you will must discover how to come back to your original dimension.

As scientist, protected by a nanosuit, you will must go to adventure of exploration and discovering. But this time it not will only be for the science, but for your own life.

Adventure, exploration, and some hazards from other dimension will be what you will find in this wonderful game of first person science fiction.
